board.name: CYW920819EVB-02
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920819EVB-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20819, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20819 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. Manufactured using advanced CMOS low-power process, the CYW20819 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYW920819EVB_02 fw2 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 62-FBGA CYW20819 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a lsm9ds1 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a ncu15wf104 thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920819EVB-02 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYBT-213043-MESH
board.summary: The EZ-BT Mesh Evaluation Kit (CYBT-213043-MESH) enables you to evaluate SIG Mesh functionality and features using the EZ-BT AIROC Module CYBT-213043-02. The CYBT-213043-02 EZ-BT AIROC Module is an integrated, fully certified, 12.0 mm x 16.61 mm x 1.70 mm, programmable dual-mode Bluetooth(R) module designed to reduce your time-to-market. The CYBT-213043-02 module utilizes the Infineon CYW20819 silicon device.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota hal btsdk fw2 CYBT_213043_MESH
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20819-based dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.0-compliant fully certified module (CYBT-213043-02)
  • On-Board Sensor for Mesh Application Development (Thermistor, ALS, PIR Motion Sensor)
  • On-Board RGB LED with additional 1MB External Serial Flash
  • Bluetooth Low Energy (LE), Bluetooth Basic Rate (BR) and Enhanced Data Rate (EDR)
  • FCC, ISED, MIC, and CE Certified Module on board (CYBT-213043-02)
  • Bluetooth 5.0 with SIG MESH Qualified Module (CYBT-213043-02)
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge
Kit Contents:
  • 4x Mesh Evaluation Boards
  • 4x USB-A to USB Micro-B Cables
  • 1x Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYBT-213043-EVAL
board.summary: The Infineon CYBT-213043-EVAL Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the EZ-BT AIROC Module CYBT-213043-02. The CYBT-213043-02 EZ-BT AIROC Module is an integrated, fully certified, 12.0 mm x 16.61 mm x 1.70 mm, programmable dual-mode Bluetooth module designed to reduce your time-to-market. The CYBT-213043-02 module utilizes the Infineon CYW20819 silicon device. Manufactured using advanced CMOS low-power process, the CYW20819 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota hal btsdk fw2 CYBT_213043_EVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20819-based dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.0-compliant fully certified module (CYBT-213043-02)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • User switches and LEDs
  • FCC, ISED, MIC, and CE Certified Module on board (CYBT-213043-02)
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYBT-213043-EVAL Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920820EVB-02
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920820EVB-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20820, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20820 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20820 delivers up to 10.5 dBm Tx power in LE and BR modes and up to 4 dBm in EDR mode that extends range in applications like home and industrial automation, wearables, toys, and HID. The CYW20820 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920820EVB_02 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 62-FBGA CYW20820 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a lsm9ds1 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a ncu15wf104 thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920820EVB-02 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920819REF-KB-01
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920819REF-KB-01 Reference Keyboard enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth HID keyboard device applications using the CYW9208XXWCD1 module, a 112-pin module utilizing the Infineon CYW20819 silicon, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20819 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR.
board.prov_capabilities: hid ota btsdk fw2 CYW920819REF_KB_01
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 112-pin CYW20819 module dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Keyboard hardware
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

board.name: CYW989820EVB-01
board.summary: The Infineon CYW989820EVB-01 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW89820, an Automotive qualified dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless SoC device. The CYW89820 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW89820 delivers up to 10.5 dBm Tx power in LE and BR modes and up to 4 dBm in EDR mode that extends range in applications like Automotive Keyless Entry, Remote Parking, Sensor Control, Wake-up trigger for Telematics units etc. The CYW89820 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota peps hal btsdk fw2 CYW989820EVB_01 CYW208XX
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 48-WQFN CYW89820 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW989820EVB-01 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920721B2EVK-02
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920721B2EVK-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20721, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.1 wireless MCU device for audio. The CYW20721 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20721 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920721B2EVK_02
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20721B2 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.1-compliant wireless MCU packaged into a SiP Module with external Low Noise Amplifier and Power Amplifier (eLNA/ePA)
  • Audio Arduino shield with on-board microphones, audio codec chip, headphone and speaker output
  • On-board sensors - a 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920721B2EVK-02 Evaluation board
  • CYW9BT Audio 2 Arduino shield (pre-assembled on top of the CYW920721B2EVK-02 evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Power Adapter
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYBT-413061-EVAL
board.summary: The Infineon CYBT-413061-EVAL board enables you to evaluate and develop Bluetooth applications using the CYBT-413061-02 module. The CYBT-413061-02 is a dual-mode Bluetooth BR/EDR and Low Energy (LE) wireless module solution. The CYBT-413061-02 includes onboard crystal oscillators, passive components, and the Infineon CYW20721B2 silicon device.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYBT_413061_EVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYBT-413061-02 is a fully certified, 12.0 mm x 16.3 mm x 1.70 mm, programmable module designed to reduce your time to market
  • Evaluation board can be used as a standalone evaluation kit or can be combined with Arduino compatible shields
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • EZ-BT Module Evaluation board (CYBT-413061-EVAL) with on board module (CYBT-413061-02)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable

board.name: CYW920706WCDEVAL
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920706WCDEVAL Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20706, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20706 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20706 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYW920706WCDEVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20706 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M3 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The Infineon CYW920706WCDEVAL board is an evaluation board that provides various pins, jumpers, switches, ports, and test points to access CYW20706 to perform debug, evaluation, and troubleshooting.

board.name: CYBT-353027-EVAL
board.summary: The Infineon CYBT-353027-EVAL Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20706, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. The CYW20706 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20706 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYBT_353027_EVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20706 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M3 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The EZ-BT Module Arduino Evaluation Board (CYBT-353027-EVAL) enables you to evaluate and develop applications on the EZ-BT AIROC Module, CYBT-353027-02. CYBT-353027-EVAL can be used as a standalone evaluation kit or can be combined with Arduino compatible shields.

board.name: CYBT-343026-EVAL
board.summary: The Infineon CYBT-343026-EVAL Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20706, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. The CYW20706 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20706 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYBT_343026_EVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20706 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M3 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The EZ-BT Module Arduino Evaluation Board (CYBT-343026-EVAL) enables you to evaluate and develop applications on the EZ-BT AIROC Module, CYBT-343026-01. CYBT-343026-EVAL can be used as a standalone evaluation kit or can be combined with Arduino compatible shields.

board.name: CYW920735Q60EVB-01
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920735Q60EVB-01 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20735, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. The CYW20735 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting BR and LE. EDR is not supported. The CYW20735 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. The device includes several on-chip peripherals including a hardware key scanner, PWMs, and an ADC. The device also includes an analog microphone interface that provides a low-cost solution for voice-enabled remotes as well as Internet of Things (IoT) gadgets and toys. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 led2x CYW920735Q60EVB_01 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20735 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M4 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The Infineon CYW920735Q60EVB-01 board is an evaluation board that provides various pins, jumpers, switches, ports, and test points to access CYW20735 to perform debug, evaluation, and troubleshooting.

board.name: CYW9M2BASE-43012BT
board.summary: The Infineon CYW9M2BASE-43012BT is a prototyping kit that enables the design and debug of Bluetooth applications using the CYW43012 (Wi-Fi + Bluetooth Combo), an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW43012 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The kit includes an Audio Arduino shield with on-board microphones, audio codec chip, and headphone output.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr audio btsdk CYW9M2BASE_43012BT
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW43012 is a monolithic, single chip, Wi-Fi + Bluetooth Combo dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M4 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The Infineon CYW9M2BASE-43012BT board is a prototyping kit that enables the design and debug of Bluetooth applications using the CYW43012.

board.name: CYW920835REF-RCU-01
board.summary: The Infineon CYW920835REF-RCU-01 Reference remote enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth Low Energy remote device applications using the CYW20835, an ultra-low-power Bluetooth Low Energy 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20835 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE. The CYW20835 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop remote applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920835REF_RCU_01
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 60-QFN CYW20835B1 Bluetooth Low Energy 5.2-compliant wireless MCU
  • Reference remote hardware
  • Analog microphone
  • 16 buttons: Power, Voice, Up, Down, Left, Right, Select, Back, Home, Menu, Rewind, Play/Pause, Fast Forward, VOL+, VOL-, Mute
  • LEDs for debug only
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge
